alert.note: Alert for Accomack (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:35PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Accomack County through 515 PM EDT... At 434 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Onley, or 14 miles northeast of Exmore, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, very heavy rain, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Onancock, Parksley, Onley, Accomac, Melfa, Wachapreague, Painter, Keller, Harborton, Locustville, Pungoteague, Tasley and Quinby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
